title: Return to Phandalin
summary: After a long rest in the Tresendar Manor ruins, the party returned to Phandalin as heroes. The townsfolk whispered: 'Those are the ones that killed the Redbrands.' They met with Sildar Hallwinter, who confirmed the Black Spider's involvement and pointed them toward Cragmaw Castle to rescue Gundren. A return sweep of the hideout revealed Droop—a pathetic goblin prisoner who provided directions to Cragmaw Castle in exchange for his freedom. The party learned of Reidoth the druid in Thundertree and Qelline Alderleaf's farm. A slower session of information gathering and preparation before the next leg of the adventure.

best_moments.title: Heroes of Phandalin
best_moments.description: The party returned to Phandalin and felt the tension ease. Townsfolk stepped out cautiously, whispering recognition: 'Those are the ones that killed the Redbrands.'

quotes.speaker: Alex/GM
quotes.text: The town feels different. It's like the place was holding its breath, waiting to see if you're bringing more trouble or finally bringing good news.

quotes.speaker: Alex/GM
quotes.text: You catch whispers as they recognize you. 'Those are the ones that killed the Redbrands.'

best_moments.title: Sildar's Briefing
best_moments.description: Sildar confirmed Glasstaff's death removed 'the knife at Phandalin's throat.' He revealed that Gundren is being held at Cragmaw Castle, but no one knows where it is.

quotes.speaker: Alex/GM (Sildar)
quotes.text: Glasstaff is down? Well, good. That removes the knife at Phandalin's throat.

quotes.speaker: Alex/GM
quotes.text: Cragmaw Castle—folks in town don't know where it is, because anyone who goes looking doesn't come back with directions.

best_moments.title: Droop the Goblin
best_moments.description: The party found Droop cowering in a barracks—a pathetic goblin who was kept by the bugbears for entertainment. Charmed by Semaj, he provided directions to Cragmaw Castle.

quotes.speaker: Alex/GM (Droop)
quotes.text: Don't, don't, please don't kill me!

quotes.speaker: Alex/GM (Droop)
quotes.text: Bugbears hurt Droop. Droop not Cragmaw. Droop was just stuck.

quotes.speaker: Alex/GM (Droop)
quotes.text: If Droop not funny, they hurt Droop. But Droop listen. Droop hears talk. Droop can help.

quotes.speaker: Alex/GM (Droop)
quotes.text: Castle in the big woods. Neverwinter Woods. Old stone place, big broken towers, Cragmaw banners.

best_moments.title: The Reidoth Lead
best_moments.description: Sildar pointed them to Qelline Alderleaf's farm and mentioned Reidoth, a druid in Thundertree who knows the entire land.

quotes.speaker: Alex/GM (Sildar)
quotes.text: Go talk to Qelline Alderleaf. She knows a druid in Thundertree who knows the entire land. The druid's name is Reidoth.

best_moments.title: Lion Shield Coster Connection
best_moments.description: Kaelia recognized the blue lion symbol on the Lion Shield Coster building—the same symbol from the boxes in Cragmaw Cave.

quotes.speaker: Alex/GM
quotes.text: Kylia, when you were in the Cragmaw cave, you found boxes with a blue lion sigil. As you walked by the Lion Shield Coster, you recognized it was the same symbol.

quotes.speaker: Richard/Semaj
quotes.text: I rolled a natural one. I've never seen that before in my life.

best_moments.title: Valrex's Perfect Recap
best_moments.description: Valrex gave such an accurate recap of the previous session that Alex awarded him inspiration.

quotes.speaker: Darren/Valrex
quotes.text: We spent 4,000 turns to try to catch him, and at the very end we murdered him on the edges of his escape.

quotes.speaker: Darren/Valrex
quotes.text: And that is the best I've ever remembered any session ever.

quotes_of_the_session.speaker: Alex/GM
quotes_of_the_session.quote: Those are the ones that killed the Redbrands.

quotes_of_the_session.speaker: Alex/GM (Droop)
quotes_of_the_session.quote: Bugbears hurt Droop. Droop was just stuck.

quotes_of_the_session.speaker: Darren/Valrex
quotes_of_the_session.quote: We killed him by the skin of his teeth.

quotes_of_the_session.speaker: Alex/GM (Sildar)
quotes_of_the_session.quote: That removes the knife at Phandalin's throat.

quotes_of_the_session.speaker: Richard/Semaj
quotes_of_the_session.quote: I rolled a natural one. I've never seen that before in my life.
quotes_of_the_session.context: Failing to recognize the Lion Shield symbol

npcs_encountered.name: Sildar Hallwinter
npcs_encountered.notes: Provided intel on Black Spider, Cragmaw Castle

npcs_encountered.name: Droop
npcs_encountered.notes: Charmed by Semaj, provided Cragmaw Castle directions, released

npcs_encountered.name: Reidoth
npcs_encountered.notes: Knows the entire land, potential guide to Cragmaw Castle

character_spotlights.moment: Charmed Droop to get Cragmaw Castle directions, organized the town sweep
Recognized the Lion Shield Coster symbol from Cragmaw Cave

character_spotlights.one_liner: The best I've ever remembered any session.

plot_developments: Met with Sildar at the Stonehill Inn
Learned Gundren is at Cragmaw Castle
Found and interrogated Droop the goblin
Got directions to Cragmaw Castle (Neverwinter Woods)
Learned about Reidoth the druid in Thundertree

end_state.party_status: Preparing for journey to Cragmaw Castle
end_state.next_objective: Visit Lion Shield Coster, then travel to Cragmaw Castle to rescue Gundren
